__e: I thought we got a number of words to say at birth...
For someone who's all-powerful, you sure do like to hide.
Yes, but why did you hide them?
That's where they are? Why would you hide them?
I wondered, if this Bible was so important, why'd you leave it out of reach?
Murphy needs to fingerprint everyone so he can have something to compare... with the prints he took off the elevator.
What else are you keeping from us?
Did you buy Fortune from me, or the old one?
You've taught yourself to hide from who and what you are for a thousand years.
Look, just go back over to my place, hide out and I'll figure this out.
You know, you've been hiding out up here for quite a few days now.
You'll hide them in a safe and secure hiding place, awaiting further instructions from me.
Please tell me this is some kind of prank, and she's really hiding in your closet.
You hide her and you say you don't know!
